Class EventParser

public class EventParser
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience methods for extracting FacesEvent related information from the incoming request.

Method Detail

queueFacesEvents

public static void queueFacesEvents(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context)

Look in the #FACES_EVENT_HEADER and parse it according to the following syntax

EVENT_TYPE,clientId,PhaseId[,eventCtorArgs...],...[;EVENT_TYPE,clientId,PhaseId,...]*

Where EVENT_TYPE is the String ValueChangeEvent, ActionEvent, or one of the event types defined to the system in the that must be a subclass of FacesEvent.
